name: MIAMI NECTAR Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy..Scent Type: Warm & Sweet Gourmands..Key Notes: Pink Pineapple, Coconut Water, Sweet Amber..Fragrance Description: A hot Miami summer, the beach at sunset, art deco pools and neon lights...meet MIAMI NECTAR, a lush and extravagant tropical-gourmand fragrance. MIAMI NECTAR is a scene-stealing perfume, opening with pink pineapple and coconut water, and backed by plumeria, vanilla, sweet amber, and salted woods...About the Bottle: The faceted angles of Ellis Brooklyn bottles are a nod to the clean, crisp lines of the Art Deco periodu2014also considered the golden era of book cover designs. Ellis Brooklyn perfumes are inspired by literature, verse, and the written word. The modern bottles paired with labels focused on font and typography are a nod to our founderu2019s roots as a longtime New York Times writer...Clean at Sephora.CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Water (Aqua/Eau), Citric Acid, Tetrahydroxypropyl Ethylene Diamine, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Coumarin, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool.The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spray on pulse points or on the body as desired....Recycling Instructions:.-The glass bottle and outer cardboard box are 100 percent recyclable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: MIAMI NECTAR Eau de Parfum by Ellis Brooklyn is a captivating fragrance that truly embodies the essence of a tropical paradise. From the first spritz, I was transported to the sun-soaked beaches of Miami, surrounded by lush florals and sweet, juicy fruits. The top notes of Italian bergamot and pineapple are bright and invigorating, creating a refreshing burst that wakes up the senses. As the fragrance settles, the heart notes of jasmine and tuberose add a rich, floral depth that is both elegant and intoxicating. The base notes of sandalwood and vanilla provide a warm, creamy finish that lingers beautifully on the skin. What I love most about MIAMI NECTAR is its versatility. It's perfect for both daytime wear and evening outings, adding a touch of sophistication and allure to any occasion. The longevity is impressive, lasting throughout the day without needing frequent reapplication. The bottle design is also worth mentioningu2014sleek and modern, it looks stunning on my vanity. Overall, MIAMI NECTAR Eau de Parfum by Ellis Brooklyn is a must-have for anyone looking to add a bit of tropical luxury to their fragrance collection. It's a delightful blend of fruity and floral notes that is sure to become a favorite.

reviews.review_title: Tropical, Sweet, Fresh, & Bright! Summer Perfect!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beachy, tropical, fresh, sweet, juicy, bright, green, woody, and a little floral. This opens so beautifullyu2026 itu2019s bright, juicy, sweet, and tropical! I really pick up on the fresh coconut water, sweet and juicy pineapple, and fresh and green palm leaf. Thereu2019s a soft floral scent which Iu2019m picking up mostly frangipani from with just a whisper of vanilla. The woody base notes of amberwood, driftwood, and moss shine through, but only subtly. They add a kind of earthy, green, and woody background.   This is so pretty and tropical at first! However, after the dry down occurs those wonderful top notes start to slowly become less prominent and those woody base notes start slowly becoming more prominent. The fragrance starts to take on a different feel. I can still smell the coconut water, pineapple, and palm leaf, but theyu2019re much more subtle and no longer have such a sweet, juicy, and bright scent. They seem to leave behind their vibrancy as the scent becomes much more woody and mossy smelling. By that point itu2019s then leaning a bit more masculine.   To keep this smelling like the lovely sweet, bright, juicy, and tropical scent this starts off as Iu2019ll just have to reapply it throughout the day. Thatu2019s obviously a downside, but I really do like how this one smells. Itu2019s so cool and refreshing to wear during hot summer days.

reviews.review_text: My best friend & I went into Sephora today to test out Miami Nectar, and we both bought it on the spot! we tend to gravitate towards gourmands, but it can be tricky finding a scent that doesn't dry down into a sickly sweet scent. However, that's not an issue with Miami Nectar! The pink pink pineapple, palm leaves, and coconut water (top notes) leave you with a warm, sweet, and clean scent and the feeling that you just spent a calming day on the beach with friends. As the fragrance dried I primarily noticed the sweet amber woods & vanilla coming through but the top notes were clearly still there! I would recommend this scent for anyone looking for a great summer scent & has an affinity for gourmand scents.

It smells amazing when you first spray it. Sadly, that juicy pineapple & coconut scent I love so much quickly (and I mean QUICK) dries down into something that doesnu2019t smell so delicious or feminine.  Kinda smells like a musky cologne. I even tried layering it with the pineapple body oil but it wasnu2019t giving what it gave in store. Unfortunately Iu2019ll be returning. I may get a travel size, but this definitely ainu2019t full bottle worthy. At least it doesnu2019t smell like sun block.
Summer dream scent!! Light and fruity, slightly powdery on my skin but also last all day. Ellis Brooklyn never fails to disappoint!!! I love you

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was drawn in by terms sweet and gourmand described above. This is a unisex scent, my bf says it smells cologne-ish. Itu2019s a nice scent, but I would rather smell it on him than me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only bought it cus tiktok made it seem this was so good but Iu2019m disappointed at least for me it doesnu2019t smell like OMG IS BOMB AF! It smell ok but didnu2019t wow me. Doesnu2019t smell bad neither. Oh and also DOESNT LAST ALL DAY FYI  LAST

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

This smells AMAZING!! It is the perfect summer scent and will be my new go to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this fragrance for the summer. Itu2019s so tropical and so Miami/Florida type of scent. Here in Florida itu2019s almost always summer year round. Really beautiful fruity, tropical, vanilla and slight musky in the dry down scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Sadly for me I only smell the spiciness (like peppercorn)  - I canu2019t smell the coconut or pineapple. Smells more floral than sweet with strong peppercorn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This really does smell amazing, just as described. I absolutely love it. The problem is you're wearing it for yourself. It's very weak, and  unless you spray it and stand right next to another person, you're the only one that will enjoy it. I have wore it probably a dozen times and not one person has complimented it. Not my husband, family, friends, strangers... nobody. I typically get a ton of compliments on my go to fragrances. Big bummer because I have been wearing the same spring/summer scent for years and I really want something new. This is great though if you you're going somewhere and don't want to overpower anyones nose but still know you're wearing something. It really is delicious. Just wish it had staying power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The tropical notes donu2019t really come through, mainly just a strong vanilla scent.

reviews.review_title: Nice smell but stuff floating in the tube.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This honestly smells amazing and is the perfect summer scent with fabulous notes. It's sweet but leans more on the fresh side. I feel like it would last most of the day but you could refresh it without it being overwhelming. If it was just based off of scent it'd be five stars for me but it appears that there is stuff floating around in my bottle and that's a bit off-putting because I dont know what it is. I'll post a picture of what it looks like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!! I bought the travel spray and just went back for the full size!!!! I love this fragrance!!! Itu2019s fresh and tropical but also warm, sexy and sultry!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best summer perfume. Smells divine. Summer, aquatic, beachy, juicy all in one. Gorgeous! Need full bottle asap. Staying power isnu2019t as strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally the best perfume I have ever owned. I would die for it but it does dry down a little weak unfortunately

reviews.review_title: Knew I needed it on first spritz..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Knew I needed it on first spritz.. it smells very tropical / pineapple / coconut on first spray .. almost like a body mist u2026 but as it dries down omg. Itu2019s so layered and interesting and special. Im very picky about about fragrances as I get migraines, I usually like sweeter scents but not too sickly sweet. This is a perfect summer scent. Dried down with this indescribable scent .. lasts extremely well, good protection, I can still smell it in my hair the next day. Going to be my summer scent for sure I donu2019t want to wear anything else.

reviews.review_title: Strange dry down but i still like it

reviews.review_text: I do like this scent. Very tropical and beachy initially. But it fades to an almost masculine cologne smellu2026if that makes sense? I still like it enough to not return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Give it a second to settle on the skin and it smells amazing. I will say that it smells slightly different on each person I think itu2019s just due to how it mixes with your skin. Itu2019s warm and spicy! Def worth a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent!! It's fresh, fruity, juicy and is summer in a bottle. Not usually a fan of summer/solar scents however this one is one of my favourites. The only downside is the projection isn't fantastic (lasts about 3-4 hours ish) but would still definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so good! Perfect summer scent. Itu2019s like a sugary pineapple but finishes a little masculine but not in a bad way. Will definitely buy the full size

Really beautiful summer scent. It reminds me a lot of the nest Madagascar vanilla perfume oil but with more layers. It almost leans masculine but thereu2019s a sweetness that saves it. Itu2019s very warm with hints of pineapple and a true nutty coconut, borderline toasted coconut. It pairs really well with Bianco latte and kayali vanilla 28 if youu2019re a vanilla lover. It could be worn day or night without an offensive projection. It will definitely be my main summer fragrance this year. If youu2019re a gourmand lover, Iu2019d definitely say to give this a try. Itu2019s a very sophisticated gourmand with a hint of freshness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ellis Brooklyn slays it again! Last summer my signature scent was Sunfruit and I didnu2019t think it could get better. Miami nectar did it! Upon first spray itu2019s sweet and refreshing and then it dries down to have a subtle spice init  itu2026 all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is like summer in a bottle! It starts with a burst of juicy pineapple and creamy coconut, just like a delicious piu00f1a colada but way more glamorous. As it dries down, the warm woody and vanilla notes come through, making it so much more than your usual beachy scent. At first, I thought it was just another tropical perfume, but itu2019s totally special and super addictive.Itu2019s fruity, sweet, and has a lovely tropical floral hint that lasts for a long time. Itu2019s the ultimate summer scent, perfect for anyone who loves yummy, gourmand fragrances!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a good fragrance for summer if you want something fresh/fruity but more elevated. I have the sun fruit scent as well and like this more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent SO much but I wish it was maybe 2-3x stronger. I find myself having to respray every couple hours or so (and that's being generous). I feel like I'm on a tropical vacation whenever I use this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A beautiful summer scent! This smells like a piu00f1a colada, but a sexy one! At first spray you get that juicy, sweet pineapple coconut, but the dry down is even better. The woody base notes along with the vanilla shine through and turn this into something more than your typical summer beach scent. At first I thought it was your average sunscreen tropical type scent, but itu2019s not. Itu2019s something special. I find it addicting. I couldnu2019t stop smell in my wrist. I feel like this is a summery scent for gourmand lovers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This does not smell like a body mist. The first few minutes of spraying maybe, but it develops into this slightly fruity vanilla bean woody scent. The dry down is beautiful and mature and has pretty good performance too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is an absolute winner for me! Got the travel size & will definitely buy the full size. It is warm and fruity, with staying power and wears beautifully! Such an easy scent to wear!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

Itu2019s fruity  and sweet with the pink pineapple and coconut at first then dries down to a sweet floral fruity tropical delicious scent that stayed on my sin all night until I washed it off. Itu2019s the perfect summer scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: This is so good! Almost as good as Sun Fruit!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone

reviews.review_title: Bath and body works sensual amber dupe

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is definitely a u201cnighttime beachyu201d scent. I get the tropical notes but very sultry with the amber/musky note. This fragrance is definitely long lasting. Only complaint: top unscrews easily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing makes me want to book a flight to Miami quite like this scent! I love u2014 and itu2019s also super long lasting which is such a huge bonus. I have noticed people compliment it hours after Iu2019ve put it on. Will def be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying Ellis Brooklyn In exchange for my review and I love!!! Miami Nectar is amazing! Itu2019s a great summer scent that leaves me feeling like I am ready for the beach! You can smell the pineapple but itu2019s not overpowering. The nice part is the perfume lasts all day too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The essence of summer is perfectly captured in the fragrance you described, evoking vivid memories of sun-drenched days by the sea. The inclusion of pink pineapple in the scent profile brings a fresh, tropical twist that is both sweet and slightly tart, reminiscent of exotic summer drinks sipped under a wide-brimmed hat. The coconut water adds a creamy, hydrating element that transports one to sandy shores! Itu2019s a yes for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this fragrance from Ellis for the first time, and I'm really pleased with it. The juicy pineapple and sweet coconut burst in the opening instantly transport you to a tropical paradise. It's now my favorite go-to fragrance for hot summer days. I love that it's not too strong but lasts a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Incredible perfume! I bought the mini size but will buy the big bottle for sure. I love this perfume. I recently bought 5 new scents, kayali eden apple, kayali lychee, Ellis Brooklyn peach body mist, Ellis Brooklyn sea body mist and this. Out of the 5 this is by far my favorite and has the best longevity too. I smell coconut and a light floral smell and realistic pineapple. It smells fruity and sweet in the best possible way.

reviews.review_title: Sol de Janeiro 62 with very good longevity 5/5
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just received a Sample of this fragrance Iu2019m Iu2019m so glad to find it. To my nose itu2019s very similar to the sol de Janeiro 62 body mist, I actually have that one and compare them side by side. So if you want that scent with more longevity go for this one because I personally donu2019t like the sol de Janeiro perfume version but this one is great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am such a beach girl and this Miami Nectar scent totally captures the essence of seaside living! I love how the scent of coconut and florals melds for the perfect summer scent. It lingers on my skin all day and becomes even more gorgeous and pleasant over time! I will be bringing this on all of my travels this summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a perfect summer fragrance. It smells so good. It gives me a vacation vibes . Iu2019m getting so many compliments every time I wear it . I love the combination of florals and sweetness of pineapple and coconut. This is my new favorite fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Miami Nectar from Ellis Brooklyn In exchange for my review. I am already a huge fan of Ellis Brooklyn fragrances. Sun Fruit is one of the few bottles in my large collection that I have finished and repurchased. I didnu2019t think Miami Nectar would top it, but it has. This fragrance is a clean gourmand. You can truly smell the pineapple without it smelling like sunscreen in a bottle. The scent lasts, is distinct, and feels like an breezy walk down South Beach. Iu2019ve already purchased the full size on my own. I highly recommend, and I think this perfume can be worn outside of the warmer months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A perfect scent for summer!!! It has the best smell my nose has ever encountered, but then again summer is my favorite season and the beach is my favorite place. When my nose smells it, my brain thinks I am on a beach oasis somewhere sipping a pina colada!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely obsessed with this fragrance. Itu2019s light and summery, with the just enough of a hint of coconut. It is the perfect fragrance to wear at for the summer as it is amazing on its own but also layers nicely for more of a nighttime fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume!! I got a sample of it with an online purchase, and I absolutely adore the scent! It's sweet with tropical notes, and is such a classic feminine fragrance. That being said,I think it would be perfect for guys too. The only thing is that it's crazy expensive, so it might not be purchased as much as cheaper perfumes or colognes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin

Average longevity so I would moisturize first for longer wear. Overall I love it and sometimes I pare it with kayali sparkling lychee if I want to smell really tropical.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is sexy and sweet. It gives off an uplifting vibe and essence. It is not overpowering and does not give a headache. The scent encapsulates Miami life to its fullest! Sweet, sexy and fun are words I would use to describe this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

On the dry down I get vanilla and sweet amber. If you aren't hitting the beach this Summer this perfume will take you there!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: smells so amazing, and I get so many compliments when I put the perfume on u2764ufe0f This also goes great with the Bum Bum cream, the yellow one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! Itu2019s fruity without being too sweet or coconut ish scent. Like most fragrances these days it doesnu2019t have a good lasting power. Definitely would buy the big bottle next time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have NEVER been so enthralled by a perfume before in my entire life. I have quite a large perfume collection and this is definitely the best smelling one I have. I will be wearing this everyday!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells incredible. I highly recommend it if you like a luxurious smelling perfume thatu2019s not overpowering but will still last all day. This is a great option and one i will continue to use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So let me start with the positivesu2026 The bottle is beautiful! It has the perfect aqua color for summer, and would look so good displayed on a vanity. So for the scent. Hereu2019s where I get sad because the opening is so so so gorgeous! Itu2019s juicy sweet pineapple, light hints of fresh coconut water, and an overall tropical feel. If it stayed like this for the entirety, I would have given it five stars. But, this lasts for five mins tops. After that, all I can smell is a very masculine cologne/woody note combo that is just plain weird after such a girly and fruity opening. Itu2019s not a bad scent, but a strange lingering base combo for sure. Iu2019m not sure if Iu2019m going to keep it because itu2019s just not what I thought it would be.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was expecting something mouthwatering and tropical and this ainu2019t it.Does not smell like notes listed.This is very perfumey to my nose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a huge perfume lover so Iu2019m always on the hunt for my next purchase to add to my collection and I absolutely loved the color and the bottle from this brand so I just had to give it a try and it did not disappoint it gives me more of a winter scent as I feel like it gives a musky vanilla scent and cozy type of vibes. I donu2019t see this being a summer perfume but itu2019s definitely gonna be my go to every winter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It's nice.. i was expecting something brighter scent-wise but it's fine. I wouldn't purchase again though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this and  it was nice BUT the projection isnu2019t there nor is the longevity!!  Will be returning it or exchanging it for something else!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_text: Ellis Brooklyn Miami Nectar is a sexy summery tropical paradise all in a fragrance. At first I noticed pineapple and coconut, followed by vanilla and woody amber notes. This is paraben, phthalates, and cruelty free, also vegan.  I applied this before noon and itu2019s now almost midnight and I can still smell it as if I just applied it. Itu2019s light enough to wear to the office but will also turn heads so be sure to wear it out on the town. This by far is my favorite by Ellis Brooklyn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: The opening is bold, with Pink Pineapple being particularly noticeable. With its tropical and warm accords, Miami Nectar is a great choice for the summer season. If you favor warm gourmand scents, Iu2019m certain youu2019ll enjoy this one. Another standout creation from Ellis Brooklyn and my favorite thus far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ellis Brooklyn's MIAMI NECTAR is a sensory journey to the sultry streets of Miami. The blend of pink pineapple and coconut water transports you to a hot summer beach, while notes of plumeria and vanilla evoke the city's vibrant nightlife. The fragrance is both extravagant and tempting, making it perfect for those who crave a touch of luxury in their everyday life. Get ready to indulge in a scene-stealing scent that captures the essence of Miami's allure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying an Ellis Brooklyn fragrance and wow, I'm impressed! First of all, the fact that it has the Clean at Sephora badge is a huge plus. The fragrance itself is intoxicating. It's giving tropical, warm, sophisticated and sexy vibes. I think of tropical fruit, cocktails, and neon lights. I love a perfume even more when my husband likes them, and he's a huge fan of this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently got my hands on Miami Nectar by Ellis Brooklyn, and let me tell you, itu2019s like summer in a bottle! The first spritz instantly transports me to a sunny day on South Beach, with its vibrant and tropical scent. The blend of coconut, juicy pineapple, and sweet mango is so refreshing and uplifting. It's like a fruity cocktail for the senses. Plus, the hint of vanilla adds a touch of warmth that makes it perfect for both daytime adventures and evening soirees. The longevity is impressive too; I can still catch whiffs of it hours later. Overall, Miami Nectar is a must-have for anyone who loves fruity and exotic fragrances. Itu2019s become my go-to scent for summer, and I canu2019t get enough of it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is THE scent of the summer. It is fresh, fruity and refreshing yet sexy and luxe. I absolutely love this scent and will be wearing it all spring & summer long!
